import React from 'react' import Div from '../Div' import ContactInfoWidget from '../Widget/ContactInfoWidget' import MenuWidget from '../Widget/MenuWidget' import Newsletter from '../Widget/Newsletter' import SocialWidget from '../Widget/SocialWidget' import TextWidget from '../Widget/TextWidget' import './footer.scss' export default function Footer({copyrightText, logoSrc, logoAlt, text}) { const copyrightLinks = [ { title: 'Terms of Use', href: '/' }, { title: 'Privacy Policy', href: '/' } ] const serviceMenu = [ { title: 'Trụ sở tại Hà Nội', href: '/service/service-details' }, { title: 'Văn phòng tại TP.HCM', href: '/service/service-details' }, { title: 'Văn phòng tại Nha Trang', href: '/service/service-details' }, ] return (
Copyright © 2023 Global Living.
) }
